data.message: Can someone please help me make a friendship video, I just love the ones I have seen of my friends!!!!

replies.message: Hey Silvia. If you have enough content for us to create a video, your video will appear in your News Feed. You can also visit http://on.fb.me/1R6Wm3d to see your video when it's ready. Thanks for stopping by! -Kate
I want a friends day video.. Please!!!

please

Sary Seila check on the given site above u will see urs
I would like a friends day video please!
Hi Lindy. If you have enough content for us to create a video, it will appear in your News Feed. You can also visit http://on.fb.me/1UQP6aK to see your video when it's ready. -Rey

How do u make these

I shared my video on my time line, it is set for public, but only I can see it, not my friends. And this problem have a lot more people....I hope so Facebook will do something that our friends also can see our nice Friendship videos.
The video of friends were really good...thank you....but how do I retrieve it???
How do I get a video?
Thanks for your question, Leanna. If you have enough content for us to create a video, you can  visit http://on.fb.me/1RaJusW to see it when it is ready. -Jordan

But, what can do we who got our videos, but they are visible just for us, not for others ?  I shared my video on my time line, it is set for public, but only I can see it, not my friends. And this problem have a lot more people... Please, dear Facebook, do something that our friends also can see our nice Friendship videos.
May I have a friends day video please and thank you
I would like to make a friends day video but it tells me I don't have enough content I have over 2000 pictures, how could I not have enough content????
So how do I put more contents on my page,so I can have you make me a friends video???
Not. Still can't get it..
